summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsHSA/FSA eligibleCeraVe Renewing SA Cleanser, Salicylic Acid Face Wash for Balanced Skin cleanses, exfoliates and removes excess oil while reinforcing the skin's protective barrier with ceramides.
details: DetailsBenefitsEffective face wash formula removes dirt and oil while softening and smoothing skinGentle cleanser formulation exfoliates the skin with salicylic acidNo harsh microbeads that can irritate skin or damage the environmentHelps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramidesHelps attract moisture to the skin with hyaluronic acidHelps soothe the skin with niacinamideEnriched with antioxidant Vitamin DSuitable for face and body, as well as acne-prone skinNon-comedogenicFragrance FreeAllergy-testedDeveloped with dermatologistsKey IngredientsSalicylic acid gently exfoliates for soft, smooth skinCeramides help restore and maintain the skin's natural barrierHyaluronic acid attracts hydration to the skin's surface and helps dry skin retain moistureNiacinamide helps calm the skinVitamin D provides antioxidant benefitsMVE Technology, a patented delivery system, continually releases moisturizing ingredientsFormulated WithoutFragranceMicrobeadsItem 2283676How To UseWet skin with lukewarm water. Massage cleanser into skin in a gentle, circular motion. Rinse.IngredientsPurified Water, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Niacinamide, Gluconolactone, Sodium Methylcocoyl Taurate, PEG-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, Salicylic Acid, Ceramide 6-11, Ceramide 3, Ceramide 1, Hyaluronic Acid, Cholesterol Sodium Benzoate, Zea Mays (Corn) Oil, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholecalciferol, Phytosphingosine, Xanthan Gum, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide.
how_to_use: Wet skin with lukewarm water. Massage cleanser into skin in a gentle, circular motion. Rinse.

reviews.headline: Only thing that works
reviews.comments: I have tried every product from the 1970s on, as my skin was very oily.  Now, my post-menopausal skin includes clogged sebaceous glands.  This product is the only one that has helped with that issue.

reviews.headline: I wouldn't buy
reviews.comments: My skin is pretty much great but I'm unsure this made it worst

reviews.headline: My favorite cleanser and I'll never stray
reviews.comments: Ive tried other stuff for oily skin, which i do have on some days especially around my cycle. This stuff helps so much with texture in ways that other cleansers by the same brand havent. Its so fast, ill finish washing my face and itll have improved the texture by the time ive dried off

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I always come to Ulta to buy this product as I can always get the bigger bottle of Cerave cleanser for cheaper than other stores. Sometimes, I catch on sale and get two bottles.

reviews.headline: IMPROVES MY ACNE A LOT
reviews.comments: This cleasner has improved my acne so much. Ive been using in the morning and at night and I am seeing crazy results. My acne breakouts are controlled and this cleanser is clearing my skin up so much.

reviews.headline: Try for yourself
reviews.comments:
It's odd to see so many telling others NOT to buy this product because of their personal experience. Skincare is subjective and personal  and how one's skin reacts to this is highly dependent on skin type and skin care routine.

At one time, I used the SA cleanser along with a kitchen sink approach toward getting rid of my acne to include Benzoyl Peroxide cream, retinol etc. So, yeah, I got the expected result: burning, inflamed skin. I got what I deserved because you can't do that and expect a prize.

Anyway, I now use this AM & PM, and let me tell you: it's been the missing link to my routine. My skin has never been more vibrant and supple, and my pores are now clear and appear smaller. My skin texture went from orange peel to newborn baby's rear end in two weeks with zero irritation.

So, moral of this review is try these products for yourself to see what your skin can tolerate. Do start slowly, perhaps use once per day, and avoid other exfoliating ingredients initially. You can add one back in once your skin acclimates to the SA. I now can use retinol after this at night, vitamin C after this in the morning and I have DRY, SENSITIVE skin. So, success is possible.

reviews.headline: My daily PM face wash
reviews.comments: I love ysing this as a double cleanser at night paired with their hydrating face wash. It is a great deep cleanser that doesn't dry out my face. Consistently helps control my breakouts.

reviews.headline: No! Burns skin
reviews.comments: I've tried so many different cerave face washes, and I have never had an issue before in my life. I used this stuff and the first night it felt like someone ripped the first layer of my skin off. I've tried to use it twice since and the same thing has happened both timesâ€¦. dooooo notttttt buy thhs

reviews.headline: Product leaks
reviews.comments: This is a good product but I've noticed that I don't know if its the product but it leaks after i use it

reviews.headline: Not what I expected at all
reviews.comments: I wish this wouldve worked for me. Im in my 30s and still breaking out like a teenager. Ive been dealing wirh cystic/hormonal acne for about 3 years now and remember this brand worked for me in HS. Saw a lot of reviews and tiktoks raving about it, but unfortunately it just made me break out more and i tried for about a month to see if maybe it was just purging but no it was non stop cystic, and painful.

reviews.headline: I love this product!
reviews.comments: The CeraVe Renewing SA Cleanser, Salicylic Acid Face Wash for Balanced Skin is an excellent product. It has helped my facial acne so much and completely changed the texture of my skin to soft and supple.

reviews.headline: Cleared skin
reviews.comments: First product to noticeably clear my breakouts. When I go without it my skin is more prone to a pimple or two.

reviews.headline: I will but I will check it better.
reviews.comments: Got it home at it is discolored compared to my almost empty bottle and smells weird.

reviews.headline: Good to Gently Even Out Skin Texture
reviews.comments: I try to avoid mechanical exfoliants (looking at you, St. Ives Apricot Scrub....) as much as possible as they're just too aggressive for me. I live in Michigan and, in the winter, my combination skin gets dry patches (especially between my brows and around my nose!). This takes off any dry/rough/flaky skin without any harsh scrubbing and does not leave any redness or patches. I follow it with Thayer's Witch Hazel toner for extra refreshing!

reviews.headline: Ick
reviews.comments: I have dry, insanely sensitive skin. I tried this because it has both Ceramides and Salicylic Acid. CeraVe has a good reputation for those with sensitive skin, but I still had a reaction to this and it dried out my skin.

reviews.headline: Awesome every day cleanser
reviews.comments: This is my tried and true for combo skin. Leaves my skin feel fresh and clean and not stripped.

reviews.headline: Works so well over time for sensitive skin.
reviews.comments:
This cleanser has been lifechanging for me, BUT you have to have patience! It took months and months to fully notice the changes this cleanser has brought in my skin. I have dry, sensitive skin, and when I used to get breakouts, they would be painful and longlasting, taking several weeks to go fully through each pimple's life cycle. Benzoyl peroxide is really drying for me so I hated having to use that constantly. I started using this cleanser (which doesn't dry me out at all), and now when i have breakouts, the pimples last a literal FRACTION of the time they used to! They cycle through in about 3 days now and I rarely have to use spot treatments anymore. 

I can't say enough about how well this has worked for me. Again, just remember you have to be patient and use this consistently over time! I do occasionally have sensitive skin flareups that this cleanser is too much for, so on those days, I switch to a gentle cleanser, but largely I've had zero issues with this one being too strong.

reviews.headline: Good but not great
reviews.comments: I have super sentsitive combo skin. This cleanser removes makeup well without causing excessive dryness or breaking me out, but it doesnt really help prevent breakouts or exfoliate the way a stronger salicylic cleanser would.

reviews.headline: Supposed to be an exfoliating CLEANSER right?
reviews.comments: Been using this product for about a month and seen no changes in my skin. I honestly feel like it doesnt do anything because ill use it emulsify it, lather for about two minutes and still when I use my toner after you wouldnt even believe that i washed my face. Will be returning

reviews.headline: Supposed to be an exfoliating CLEANSER right?
reviews.comments: Been using this product for about a month and seen no changes in my skin. I honestly feel like it doesnt do anything because ill use it emulsify it, lather for about two minutes and still when I use my toner after you wouldnt even believe that i washed my face. Will be returning

media.headline: BEST CLEANSER OUT THERE...
media.caption: We are hard-core Cerave fans now,my collection is growing...

media.headline: The FIRST non-drying Salicylic Acid cleanser Ive come across
media.caption: Cerave Renewing SA cleanser

media.headline: If I Could Give it 0 Stars I would. TikTok Made Me Do It
If I Could Give it 0 Stars I would. TikTok Made Me Do It

faceoff_positive.comments: I started using this cleanser 3 weeks ago and I can tell a difference with my enlarged pores and combination skin.  I break out sometimes with those nasty big zits underneath your skin, but since using Cerave SA Cleanser, I have not had any of those!  I love how my skin feels and looks after washing with this.  I sometimes us a Clarasonic brush, and other times, just a Buff Puff pad.  The pores in my T zone area actually look smaller.  I believe this is the salacylic acid working to deep clean the pores, which in turn, makes them appear smaller since they are not clogged up.   I also use the Cerave SA lotion underneath my makeup now as my moisturizer and so far so good.  In addition to using the SA lotion on my face,I slather it on my legs after shaving and it has been helping with ingrown hairs on legs too. For the price, an 8 oz bottle lasts a long time so it's a great value.  Even better is how much I like it.  I'm hooked on Cerave now for life.  Excellent products that work for much less than those commercial brands, so what more could you ask for?
faceoff_positive.headline: Shrinks pores and smooths skin

faceoff_negative.comments: i heard such great things about this and i was trying anything to help clear up my acne so i figured i'd give it a shot. i used it for roughly a month as directed on the bottle and over time i realized that it was bleaching a patch of skin on my forehead. i have no clue why it did this and to make matters worse it didn't even clear up my acne. it's been roughly a year since i've used this product and the lighter patch is still very obvious.
faceoff_negative.headline: don't recommend
